short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EcoTab is an extension that replaces your new tab page with one that highlights organizations that promote worldwide sustainability

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EcoTab is a browser extension that replaces your new tab page with one that highlights the achievements of organizations that promote worldwide sustainability. With EcoTab, you can see the work of environmental, sustainability-orientated, or just cool and inspiring organizations. You also have the opportunity to donate to these organizations to help them out. Help make the world a better place one tab at a time!
